name: GuesstheChristmasSong
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guess the christmas song
des:
This is a simple game. Alexa will play you short bits of famous Christmas songs, one at a time. After each song, it will give you 4 possible answers to guess the song. Pick the one that you think is correct by saying the number of the answer. The more you play, the better you will get at it. You might even discover new Christmas songs you never knew about.

Enjoy and Happy Holidays!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
